Dominum; laudāte nōmen Dominī. ^ Praise: et usque in saeculum. ^ Blessed be the name of the Lord

1 ^ Laudāte: 3 ^ Ā sōlis ortū usque ad occāsum laudābile nōmen Dominī. ^ From the rising of the sun to its setting praiseworthy is name of the Lord.

puerī: et super caelōs glōria ejus. ^ The Lord is high above all nations
Dominum; laudāte nōmen Dominī. ^ Praise: and his glory above the heavens.
^ Who is as the Lord our God

1 ^ Laudāte: 6 ^ et humilia respicit in caelō et in terrā? ^ and looketh down on the low things in heaven and in earth?

Dominum; laudāte nōmen Dominī. ^ Praise: ^ Raising up the needy from the earth
ye children; praise ye the name of the: and lifting up the poor out of the dunghill

puerī: cum prīncipibus populī suī. ^ that he may place him with princes
Dominum; laudāte nōmen Dominī. ^ Praise: with the princes of his people.

1 ^ Laudāte: 9 ^ Quī habitāre facit sterilem in domō
puerī: mātrem fīliōrum laetantem. ^ Who maketh a barren woman to dwell in a house
